thread.title: Winter in Finland is basically the most gorgeous thing ever, as proven by these photos
thread.title_full: Winter in Finland is basically the most gorgeous thing ever, as proven by these photos

author: Rachel Charlene Lewis
title: Winter in Finland is basically the most gorgeous thing ever, as proven by these photos
text:
Winter in Finland is basically the most gorgeous thing ever, as proven by these photos We have big dreams of traveling all over the world, and we’re currently in awe of these captivating photos showing the beauty of the Finnish winter. Ever since we came across these stunning shots by Yuichi Yokota, a Japanese photographer, we’ve been dying to book a trip of our own to experience winter in Finland for ourselves. After you see these pics, we’re pretty sure you will be, too.
The photographer’s trip to Finald started off on a strong note because he came across the aurora borealis, one of the world’s most beautiful sights of all. Like, wow. A photo posted by Yuichi Yokota (@yokoichi) on Jan 5, 2017 at 7:48am PST 
This shot of arctic mushing blew us away. Just look at that sunset in the distance! A photo posted by Yuichi Yokota (@yokoichi) on Jan 6, 2017 at 4:02am PST 
And it only gets better. This arctic sunset is the most stunning blend of oranges and blues, and that sliver of moon is GLORIOUS. A photo posted by Yuichi Yokota (@yokoichi) on Jan 8, 2017 at 3:48am PST 

Here, the sky is just as beautiful. We’ve never seen winter quite like this, but we heart it so much. A photo posted by Yuichi Yokota (@yokoichi) on Jan 9, 2017 at 5:39pm PST 
And, OMG. Can we talk about all this snow?! We’re freezing just looking at it. A photo posted by Yuichi Yokota (@yokoichi) on Jan 12, 2017 at 12:13am PST 
But talk about a work of art! Winter in Finland is apparently a must-see. A photo posted by Yuichi Yokota (@yokoichi) on Jan 11, 2017 at 5:58am PST 
We’d suffer through the cold if it means being surrounded by this much incredible nature!
